ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Stones on E'ci
ygData.msgSnippet: I solod in Rathe Mts. and made HGs kill each other and took their stones. ... problem nowadays is in simply finding two Hill Giants to rub together.  I usually
ygData.messageBody:
I solod in Rathe Mts. and made HGs kill each other and took their stones.
:) Very good money, so-so experience, and a Lambent stone. Easy. The only
problem nowadays is in simply finding two Hill Giants to rub together. I
usually have to stay up kinda late.

Another thing. I was wanting a stone the other night for my last piece of
Lambent. The zone was camped and I couldn't find ONE giant, much less two.
I /auc'd for a stone and some jackass wanted 100pp. I said "Hey guy, I can
buy one from the INN in Rathe Mts., a 60 second run, for 48pp." He called
me a liar of course, so I ran to the Inn and bought it for 48pp. That's the
most I've ever paid for a stone, but I knew it was the last one I'd ever
need. I was impatient. :-/

Crier

> Does anyone have any suggestions or recommendations apart from soloing in
> the Rathe mts and charming giants to kill each other?
>
> -Faras
>
